title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8140.42 - Town of Potsdam
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8140.42 - Town of Potsdam

State Regulations
(a) Sissonville

Road between the intersection of Route 56 and the entrance to the Potsdam Paper

Company plant, a distance of 0.4+- mile, is designated as an access highway for
use by 48-foot long, 102-inch wide trailers, and is not hereby designated as an
access highway for any other types of vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8140.42

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
